item.description:
Come join us, and "Walk the Talk" for our first annual Earth Day celebration.

We will be gathering at 3pm, and then going on and around Comet Pond in Hubbardston to pick up trash in honor of Earth Day, to show our concern for Mother Earth, so bring your trash bags and gloves!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Change of plans due to the weather!!

We will be gathering at 5pm at Wolf Hill Grove to meet for dinner-


At 5:30, we will be going 10 minutes down the road to a GREAT restaurant in Rutland called
Tavern on the Common, that has good food, with moderate prices. To check out their menu, click below:

http://tavernonthecom...

After dinner, we will be returning for pot luck dessert, fire INSIDE, with roasted marshmallows

We will be doing a Earth Day ceremony including
drumming & chanting, raising/sending energy to the earth, pagan discussion about current earth changes, and veiwing of Midsummer Solstice celebration 2007.

Everyone is asked to bring a dessert (homemade preferred)
-plastic tupperware and plastic doggie
bags will be provided for people to take the left overs goodies home!

BYOB
item.name: Earth Day/ Bonfire Gathering
